Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh2 for versions less than 1.11.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh2 for versions less than 1.11.1-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libssh2 is earlier than 1.11.1-1, affected by CVE-2023-48795
